response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is priced at $1,200,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and the importance it holds for both of us. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, allowing you to secure this treasure at a price that is higher than what you would pay to someone else but lower than its true worth to you. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1200000}
